column4: hello! I am new to ubuntu. so far it does everything i need except i want to be able to stream radio from a website. The only streaming formats they have are real payer or window media player. is there a way to make this work?
open up synaptic and search for ask
there should be a gstreamer plugin to allow you to stream windows media streams
is it called ask? I get a long list of things when I search for 'ask'
